title: Agri-Tech
description: Introducing 'Agri-Tech,' a collaborative platform transforming the agricultural landscape for farmers. This innovative project empowers farmers to sell their products directly to customers, cutting out the middleman and increasing their profits. Agri-Tech integrates essential tools like a pest detector, a comprehensive Farmer Resource Center with expert advice, and a community forum. The integrated dashboard allows farmers to manage orders and oversee their agricultural services with ease.
